title: White Pizza Dip Recipe
directions: In a small bowl, stir together ricotta cheese and 1 1/2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese.
Stir in dried basil and oregano.
Cut top off inch or so off of boule.
Hollow out inside, leaving about a 1-inch or so rim.
Top with remaining 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese and red pepper flakes, to taste.
Grease a sheet of aluminum foil and lightly cover.
Remove foil, and continue baking for 10-15 uncovered, or until hot and bubbly and cheese is melted.
